articles.author: Denise Wee
articles.title: UBS's Khan Vows Retention Packages for Credit Suisse Asia Staff - Bloomberg
articles.description: UBS Group AG wealth boss Iqbal Khan told Credit Suisse Group AG staff in Asia that retention packages could come as soon as next week, according to people familiar with the matter, as the bank seeks to prevent an exodus of top talent.
articles.content:

articles.author: Rasesh Mandani
articles.title: BCCI-PCB in talks for a hybrid model for Asia Cup - Hindustan Times
articles.description: If BCCI softens its stand, the tournament could stay in Pakistan with India’s matches and the final shifting to a neutral venue | Cricket
articles.content: The Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) has been publicly pushing for the Asia Cup to moved out of Pakistan but it has now emerged that the Indian board may be amenable to softening their st… [+2454 chars]
